problem_names:
lemma wt_jvm_progD:
  "wf_jvm_prog\<^bsub>\<Phi>\<^esub> P \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>wt. wf_prog wt P"

lemma wt_jvm_prog_impl_wt_instr:
  "\<lbrakk> wf_jvm_prog\<^bsub>\<Phi>\<^esub> P; 
      P \<turnstile> C sees M:Ts \<rightarrow> T = (mxs,mxl\<^sub>0,ins,xt) in C; pc < size ins \<rbrakk> 
  \<Longrightarrow> P,T,mxs,size ins,xt \<turnstile> ins!pc,pc :: \<Phi> C M"

lemma wt_jvm_prog_impl_wt_start:
  "\<lbrakk> wf_jvm_prog\<^bsub>\<Phi>\<^esub> P; 
     P \<turnstile> C sees M:Ts \<rightarrow> T = (mxs,mxl\<^sub>0,ins,xt) in C \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> 
  0 < size ins \<and> wt_start P C Ts mxl\<^sub>0 (\<Phi> C M)"
translations:
lemma wt_jvm_progD:
  "wf_jvm_prog\<^bsub>\<Phi>\<^esub> P \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>wt. wf_prog wt P"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. wf_jvm_prog\<^bsub>\<Phi>\<^esub> P \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>wt. wf_prog wt P

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. wf_jvm_prog\<^bsub>\<Phi>\<^esub> P \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>wt. wf_prog wt P
by (unfold wf_jvm_prog_phi_def, blast)

lemma wt_jvm_prog_impl_wt_instr:
  "\<lbrakk> wf_jvm_prog\<^bsub>\<Phi>\<^esub> P; 
      P \<turnstile> C sees M:Ts \<rightarrow> T = (mxs,mxl\<^sub>0,ins,xt) in C; pc < size ins \<rbrakk> 
  \<Longrightarrow> P,T,mxs,size ins,xt \<turnstile> ins!pc,pc :: \<Phi> C M"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>wf_jvm_prog\<^bsub>\<Phi>\<^esub> P;
     P \<turnstile> C sees M: Ts\<rightarrow>T = (mxs, mxl\<^sub>0, ins,
            xt) in C;
     pc < length ins\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> P,T,mxs,length
                               ins,xt \<turnstile> ins ! pc,pc :: \<Phi> C M

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>wf_jvm_prog\<^bsub>\<Phi>\<^esub> P;
     P \<turnstile> C sees M: Ts\<rightarrow>T = (mxs, mxl\<^sub>0, ins,
            xt) in C;
     pc < length ins\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> P,T,mxs,length
                               ins,xt \<turnstile> ins ! pc,pc :: \<Phi> C M
apply (unfold wf_jvm_prog_phi_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>wf_prog
              (\<lambda>P C (M, Ts, T\<^sub>r, mxs, mxl\<^sub>0, is, xt).
                  wt_method P C Ts T\<^sub>r mxs mxl\<^sub>0 is xt
                   (\<Phi> C M))
              P;
     P \<turnstile> C sees M: Ts\<rightarrow>T = (mxs, mxl\<^sub>0, ins,
            xt) in C;
     pc < length ins\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> P,T,mxs,length
                               ins,xt \<turnstile> ins ! pc,pc :: \<Phi> C M
apply (drule (1) sees_wf_mdecl)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>P \<turnstile> C sees M: Ts\<rightarrow>T = (mxs, mxl\<^sub>0,
                    ins, xt) in C;
     pc < length ins;
     wf_mdecl
      (\<lambda>P C (M, Ts, T\<^sub>r, mxs, mxl\<^sub>0, is, xt).
          wt_method P C Ts T\<^sub>r mxs mxl\<^sub>0 is xt (\<Phi> C M))
      P C (M, Ts, T, mxs, mxl\<^sub>0, ins, xt)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> P,T,mxs,length
                               ins,xt \<turnstile> ins ! pc,pc :: \<Phi> C M
apply (simp add: wf_mdecl_def wt_method_def)

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done

lemma wt_jvm_prog_impl_wt_start:
  "\<lbrakk> wf_jvm_prog\<^bsub>\<Phi>\<^esub> P; 
     P \<turnstile> C sees M:Ts \<rightarrow> T = (mxs,mxl\<^sub>0,ins,xt) in C \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> 
  0 < size ins \<and> wt_start P C Ts mxl\<^sub>0 (\<Phi> C M)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>wf_jvm_prog\<^bsub>\<Phi>\<^esub> P;
     P \<turnstile> C sees M: Ts\<rightarrow>T = (mxs, mxl\<^sub>0, ins,
            xt) in C\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> 0 < length ins \<and>
                      wt_start P C Ts mxl\<^sub>0 (\<Phi> C M)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>wf_jvm_prog\<^bsub>\<Phi>\<^esub> P;
     P \<turnstile> C sees M: Ts\<rightarrow>T = (mxs, mxl\<^sub>0, ins,
            xt) in C\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> 0 < length ins \<and>
                      wt_start P C Ts mxl\<^sub>0 (\<Phi> C M)
apply (unfold wf_jvm_prog_phi_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>wf_prog
              (\<lambda>P C (M, Ts, T\<^sub>r, mxs, mxl\<^sub>0, is, xt).
                  wt_method P C Ts T\<^sub>r mxs mxl\<^sub>0 is xt
                   (\<Phi> C M))
              P;
     P \<turnstile> C sees M: Ts\<rightarrow>T = (mxs, mxl\<^sub>0, ins,
            xt) in C\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> 0 < length ins \<and>
                      wt_start P C Ts mxl\<^sub>0 (\<Phi> C M)
apply (drule (1) sees_wf_mdecl)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>P \<turnstile> C sees M: Ts\<rightarrow>T = (mxs, mxl\<^sub>0,
                    ins, xt) in C;
     wf_mdecl
      (\<lambda>P C (M, Ts, T\<^sub>r, mxs, mxl\<^sub>0, is, xt).
          wt_method P C Ts T\<^sub>r mxs mxl\<^sub>0 is xt (\<Phi> C M))
      P C (M, Ts, T, mxs, mxl\<^sub>0, ins, xt)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> 0 < length ins \<and>
                      wt_start P C Ts mxl\<^sub>0 (\<Phi> C M)
apply (simp add: wf_mdecl_def wt_method_def)

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done
end
